mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Menu ( menuId, name, content, price, menuPictureUrl ) VALUES ( MENU_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{content}, #{price}, #{menuPictureUrl, jdbcType=CLOB} )
mapper.select: SELECT menuId AS menuId, name AS name, content AS content, price AS price, menuPictureUrl AS menuPictureUrl, createdDate AS createdDate, modifiedDate AS modifiedDate FROM Menu ORDER BY menuId DESC
SELECT menuId AS menuId, name AS name, content AS content, price AS price, menuPictureUrl AS menuPictureUrl, createdDate AS createdDate, modifiedDate AS modifiedDate FROM Menu WHERE menuId = #{id}
